projectDescription: Developed a mobile app using Flutter and Firebase to manage vehicle fleets efficiently.
Implemented real-time tracking and analytics to optimize routes and reduce fuel consumption.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers using Figma to create an intuitive user interface.
Designed a machine learning model using Python, OpenCV, and TensorFlow to detect weapons in real-time video streams.
Deployed the model to a cloud environment for scalable processing.
Achieved 95% accuracy in detection, significantly improving security measures.
Completed an internship focused on Salesforce administration and application development.
Automated customer service processes to improve response times and client satisfaction.
Gained hands-on experience with Salesforce tools and workflows.
